channel.title: Is The Hamachi ServerStatus Going To Be Back Up?
channel.description:
[size=21pt]HAMACHI SERVER STATUS[/size]
There has been alot of good updates on the regular server status for no-ip ones but what about hamachi some people cant port forward so they use hamachi but they cant do much now because the server status is down can someone tell me when it will be back up?
[size=12pt]-Yoko nono[/size]

item.title: Is The Hamachi ServerStatus Going To Be Back Up?
item.dc:creator: @Shogunreaper Shogunreaper
item.description:
@Shogunreaper wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:7, topic:227458”][quote author=YoKo NoNo link=topic=298870.msg2400711#msg2400711 date=1219433465]
What do you mean get someone to do it for u?
[/quote]

Get someone to host Steal your server[/quote]

Read full topic
